description: Retrieve a list of debug information files for a given project.

path_parameters.description: the slug of the organization the file belongs to.
path_parameters.name: organization_slug

path_parameters.description: the slug of the project to list the DIFs of.
path_parameters.name: project_slug

query_parameters.description: If set, this parameter is used to locate DIFs with.
query_parameters.name: query

query_parameters.description: If set, the specified DIF will be sent in the response.
query_parameters.name: id

title: List a Project's Debug Information Files
